titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Two-Hundredth Anniversary Celebration of the Grove Street Cemetery Symposium Collection
Grove Street Cemetery Symposium (Two-Hundredth Anniversary Celebration of) Collection
titlestmt.author: compiled by Christine Weideman

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Wednesday January 9, 2019 at 09:13

did.unittitle: Two-Hundredth Anniversary Celebration of the Grove Street Cemetery Symposium collection.

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: Program for, and eight video tapes of, a symposium, sponsored by the Friends of the Grove Street Cemetery in 1998, commemorating the two-hundredth anniversary of the Grove Street Cemetery (originally known as the New Haven Burying Ground) in New Haven, Connecticut.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Friends of the Grove Street Cemetery

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Friends of the Grove Street Cemetery, 2002.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creator(s) of this collection for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Two-Hundredth Anniversary Celebration of the Grove Street Cemetery Symposium Collection (MS 1801). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Program for, and eight video tapes of, a symposium, sponsored by the Friends of the Grove Street Cemetery in 1998, commemorating the two-hundredth anniversary of the Grove Street Cemetery (originally known as the New Haven Burying Ground) in New Haven, Connecticut.
